name: Shelly Manne
description: '''Sheldon''' "'''Shelly'''" '''Manne''' (June 11, 1920 – September 26, 1984) was an American [[Jazz drumming|jazz drummer]]. Most frequently associated with [[West Coast jazz]], he was known for his versatility and also played in a number of other styles, including [[Dixieland]], [[Swing music|swing]], [[bebop]], [[avant-garde jazz]], and later [[Jazz fusion|fusion]]. He also contributed to the musical background of hundreds of [[Cinema of the United States|Hollywood]] films and television programs.
